title: I need opinions
body:
Looking at my recent Vayne games, do you guys think I can climb to Gold next season with Vayne?

These are just some of the games in normals.

replies.body:
"let's post this match history under the guise of asking for advice, when I really just want to stroke my ego"

Match histories are not a measure of skill. You probably know that.
If you're able to play lane phase well enough that you either win lane or come out with good farm and no deaths every game then you'll get Gold easily.

That 0/0/0 victory,

Morello you see that?
I d/c'd during that game haha, managed to run away from a trundle tho

yep lost games and dropped to low elo then played a fricking OP champ, gets fed then says its because hes good.

mate, check my match history, i am having the EXACT SAME PREDICAMENT but dont play ranked, you'll be gutted.

rankeds =/= normals
I didn't say I was good.
if i can climb to gold playing only support then im sure you will be fine mate
